data.title: School of Business
data.meta_description: Become a working professional through the Whitworth School of Business, with undergraduate and graduate programs in business and management.
data.text: The Whitworth School of Business is an accredited member of AACSB Internationalâ€”The Association to Advance Collegiate Schools of Business and includes undergraduate programs in accounting, business management, economics, marketing and finance, the business management program geared for working adults, the Master of Business Administration (MBA) and Master of Business Leadership (MBL) graduate programs, graduate certificate programs, certification preparation courses and the Whitworth Institute of Leadership. Coursework emphasizes ethics, critical thinking, teamwork and communication in business and management, along with a significant innovation component based on practical application experiences.
